member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_EXTENSION_COMMAND_PARAMETER_FLAGS
member.summary: Specifies the usage of the associated video extension command parameter.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_EXTENSION_COMMAND_PARAMETER_FLAGS.D3D12_VIDEO_EXTENSION_COMMAND_PARAMETER_FLAG_NONE
member.summary: None. Set for simple data type parameters.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_EXTENSION_COMMAND_PARAMETER_FLAGS.D3D12_VIDEO_EXTENSION_COMMAND_PARAMETER_FLAG_READ
member.summary: The resource parameter is read. This flag is for ID3D12Resource only and is not valid for simple data type parameters.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_EXTENSION_COMMAND_PARAMETER_FLAGS.D3D12_VIDEO_EXTENSION_COMMAND_PARAMETER_FLAG_WRITE
member.summary: The resource parameter is written. This flag is for ID3D12Resource only and is not valid for simple data type parameters.
